string-array.name: meal_steps_avocado_toast
string-array.item: 2. Cut the avocado in half and remove the pit.
3. Mash the avocado in a small bowl with a fork.
4. Add the minced garlic, olive oil, salt, and pepper to the bowl and mix well.
5. Toast the bread in the oven for 5-7 minutes or until it is lightly browned.
6. Spread the avocado mixture evenly on each slice of toast.

string-array.name: meal_steps_vegetable_stir_fry
string-array.item: Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat.
Add the sliced bell peppers, zucchini, squash, and onion to the skillet and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes or until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
Add the minced garlic to the skillet and stir-fry for an additional 30 seconds.
Add the soy sauce and hoisin sauce to the skillet and stir well to coat the vegetables.
Serve the stir-fry over a bed of cooked rice.
